boardPhysics

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • boardPhysics.Ball
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoardObject

    public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
implements BoardObject

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String id
      The unique identifier of this ball
      private boolean inAbsorber
      A boolean that is true if a ball is held by an absorber and true otherwise
      private double mass
      A double representing the mass of the ball, to be used as needed
      private physics.Vect pos
      A vector to the center of the ball describing its position
      private double radius
      A double representing the length of a ball's radius
      private physics.Vect vel
      A vector representing the velocity of the ball

      • impactCalc

        public double[] impactCalc(Ball ball)
        Description copied from interface: BoardObject
        Determine the time it will take until this object collides with a given ball and recalculate a ball's velocity assuming it collided with this board object
        Specified by:
        impactCalc in interface BoardObject
        Parameters:
        ball - a ball that collided with this board object
        Returns:
        a array of doubles with components: 0. Time until impact with the ball 1. x-component of the ball's new velocity post-impact 2. y-component of the ball's new velocity post-impact
